page.title: 13Leisure Pool.
page.content: Eastbourne Leisure Pool is on the eastern edge of town along the seafront. There are {3 pools, a main {pool, a diving pool and a trainer {pool.} The main pool is 33x15m. There are toilets and showers in each changing room. The pool is open every day. Refreshments are available in the cafeteria and bar. Now there are exciting plans for wave machines, flume rides, a jacuzzi, a sun terrace and more restaurants. These should be ready within a year. There will also be a luxury residential and holiday village around the pool. Eastbourne Borough Council are hoping that the new attractions will bring families for the whole day.
